project.name: javafxTool
project.description: Javafx scaffolding, you can quickly create the required javafx tools by implementing module interfaces such as frame, login and core

requireJavaVersion.message: You are running an older version of Java. This application requires at least JDK ${maven.compiler.source}.

requireMavenVersion.message: You are running an older version of Maven. This application requires at least Maven 3.6.0
